page.syntax: C node_request(C nodeService ,P pData [,L flagRestartNode [,L flagShowCommandWindow [,L flagAllowDebug ]]])

argument.name: nodeService
argument.description: Name of the node service to run.

argument.name: flagRestartNode
argument.description: Restart the node server for the project on this invokation

argument.name: flagShowCommandWindow
argument.description: Show the command window for the node service handler (allows developer to see feedback using console.log() in the handler).

argument.name: flagAllowDebug
argument.description: Enable node debugger (requires that the node debugger be launched)

page.description: Call a node service from Xbasic

description.p: Calls node service for a web project. The web project must include a 'node_services' folder with the named node service. If the service is not present in the project, you will receive an error from node.
Below is an example call - it assumes a node service called 'eval' that reads javascript to execute from a 'content' property, then returns the result.

section.example: dim req as p dim req.content as c = "1+1" ? node_request("eval",req) = {"_id":"d18fa451-5c15-4cbf-8085-92fe24890e4d","error":"command eval was not recognized for command d18fa451-5c15-4cbf-8085-92fe24890e4d","result":null}

description.p: Add a node_services to the projects 'node' subfolder - save a file called 'eval.js' that has the following contents.

The node service handler consumes a 'packet' that contains the parameters for the command. In this case, the parameter required is called "content", and gets evaluated, data is returned in a result parameter.

section.description: With 'node_services/eval.js' defined, now our example should work, notice that the result of evaluation is in a field called 'result', notice also that 'error' is blank.
section.example: dim req as p dim req.content as c = "1+1" ? node_request("eval",req) = {"_id":"d21a4938-d8bd-455f-9e82-e70bcc675316","error":"","result":2}

section.description: An example of a valid request with a handled error would be to pass a javascript expression that is invalid.
section.example: dim req as p dim req.content as c = "1+" ? node_request("eval",req) = {"_id":"4bee3d41-7816-4f0c-8b3f-ca853fa2ef0c","error":"Unexpected end of input","result":null}
